sentences.english: You are your own life of the author, why put the script written suffer unspeakably.
sentences.chinese: 你是你自己人生的作者，何必要把剧本写得苦不堪言。

sentences.english: The new "Labor Law" too harsh, grass-roots enterprises suffering.
sentences.chinese: 而新《劳动法》过于苛刻，基层企业苦不堪言。

sentences.english: The second day , training , reason why still being the upper part of the body suffer unspeakably.
sentences.chinese: 第二日，仍然是上身的训练，所以苦不堪言。

sentences.english: Just facing the piles of clutter in your home can be overwhelming.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅面对家里的杂乱不堪，你就可能会苦不堪言。

sentences.english: Truth is, you could argue that “open” makes the customer’s life miserable.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会说，事实上“开放”使客户的生活苦不堪言。

definition: to complain without stopping (idiom); to bitch endlessly/incessant grievances
to whine on for days (idiom)/to endlessly grumble complaints/incessant whining
lit. cries of complaint fill the roads (idiom); complaints rise all around/discontent is openly voiced
(saying) to be very scared and on edge
lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
lit. heart alarmed, trembling in fear (idiom); prostrate with fear/scared witless
(idiom) terribly busy/up to one's ears in work
lit. badly burned about the head (from trying to put out a fire) (idiom)/fig. hard-pressed/under pressure (from a heavy workload, creditors etc)
unable to put up with (sth) any longer
